channel.title: Pleaseeee someone help!
channel.description: Can soeone tell me how to add a portal, step by step? please I need help I know how to add a portal, but how can i make it teleport? thank u, (if u help -.-)

item.title: Pleaseeee someone help!
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

This is very easy.
---------Allstar----
First, get the object id for the portal mines 1812.
Goto client.java----
FOR ME–
make “case 1812:
then after it I would put” [code]
case 1812:
teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = yyyy;

        break;[/code]

Then for “X” and “Y” put it to where ever you want to be teleported to.
Then go to “makeglobalobject”
and would put in

	makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, 1812, -2, 10);

Then for “X” and “Y” put it to where ever you want to be located at.
------------delta
Goto client.java----
FOR ME–
make “case 1812:
then after it I would put”

[code]
case 1812:
ToX = xxxx;
ToY = yyyy;

        break;[/code]

Then for “X” and “Y” put it to where ever you want to be teleported to.
Then go to “makeglobalobject”
and would put in

	makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, 1812, -2, 10);

Then for “X” and “Y” put it to where ever you want to be located at.
----------I think thats it for “Delta” but I code allstar so I might be wrong.

Read full topic
